You are an expert in SNNs, local learning rules, and human cognitive development psychology. Review our curriculum strategy (`docs\design\curriculum_strategy.md`). Provide feedback on its effectiveness for training SNNs to acquire human-like cognitive abilities. Suggest improvements or alternative approaches based on current research in cognitive development and machine learning. Focus on curriculum structure, sequencing of learning tasks, and alignment with developmental milestones observed in humans.
